functionDecorators.name: addAssociatedAddress
functionDecorators.description: Allows an associated address to add another associated address to its Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: approvingAddress
parameterDecorators.description: An associated address for an Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: addressToAdd
parameterDecorators.description: A new address to set for the Identity of the sender.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The v component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: The r component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: The s component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp of the signature.

functionDecorators.name: addAssociatedAddressDelegated
functionDecorators.description: Allows addition of an associated address to an Identity. The first signature must be that of the approvingAddress.

parameterDecorators.name: approvingAddress
parameterDecorators.description: An associated address for an Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: addressToAdd
parameterDecorators.description: A new address to set for the Identity of approvingAddress.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The v component of the signatures.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: The r component of the signatures.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: The s component of the signatures.

parameterDecorators.name: timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp of the signatures.

functionDecorators.name: addProviders
functionDecorators.description: Allows an associated address to add providers to its Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: providers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of providers.

functionDecorators.name: addProvidersFor
functionDecorators.description: Allows providers to add providers to an Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to add providers to.

parameterDecorators.name: providers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of providers.

functionDecorators.name: addResolvers
functionDecorators.description: Allows an associated address to add resolvers to its Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: resolvers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of resolvers.

functionDecorators.name: addResolversFor
functionDecorators.description: Allows providers to add resolvers to an Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to add resolvers to.

parameterDecorators.name: resolvers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of resolvers.

functionDecorators.name: createIdentity
functionDecorators.description: Create an new Identity for the transaction sender. Sets the msg.sender as the only associatedAddress.

parameterDecorators.name: recoveryAddress
parameterDecorators.description: A recovery address to set for the new Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: providers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of providers to set for the new Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: resolvers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of resolvers to set for the new Identity.

functionDecorators.name: createIdentityDelegated
functionDecorators.description: Allows creation of a new Identity for the passed associatedAddress.

parameterDecorators.name: recoveryAddress
parameterDecorators.description: A recovery address to set for the new Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: associatedAddress
parameterDecorators.description: An associated address to set for the new Identity (must have produced the signature).

parameterDecorators.name: providers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of providers to set for the new Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: resolvers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of resolvers to set for the new Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The v component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: The r component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: The s component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp of the signature.

functionDecorators.name: getEIN
functionDecorators.description: Gets the EIN associated with the passed address. Throws if the address is not associated with an Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

functionDecorators.name: getIdentity
functionDecorators.description: Gets all identity-related information for the passed EIN. Throws if the passed EIN does not exist.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to get information for.

functionDecorators.name: hasIdentity
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the passed address is associated with an Identity. Does not throw.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

functionDecorators.name: identityExists
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the passed EIN exists. Does not throw.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to check the existence of.

functionDecorators.name: isAssociatedAddressFor
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether the passed EIN is associated with the passed address. Does not throw.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to check.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

functionDecorators.name: isProviderFor
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether the passed provider is set for the passed EIN. Does not throw.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to check.

parameterDecorators.name: provider
parameterDecorators.description: The provider to check.

functionDecorators.name: isResolverFor
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether the passed resolver is set for the passed EIN. Does not throw.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to check.

parameterDecorators.name: resolver
parameterDecorators.description: The resolver to check.

functionDecorators.name: isSigned
functionDecorators.description: Determines whether the passed signature of `messageHash` was made by the private key of `_address`.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: The address that may or may not have signed the passed messageHash.

parameterDecorators.name: messageHash
parameterDecorators.description: The messageHash that may or may not have been signed.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The v component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: The r component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: The s component of the signature.

functionDecorators.name: removeAssociatedAddress
functionDecorators.description: Allows an associated address to remove itself from its Identity.

functionDecorators.name: removeAssociatedAddressDelegated
functionDecorators.description: Allows removal of an associated address from an Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: addressToRemove
parameterDecorators.description: An associated address to remove from its Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The v component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: The r component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: The s component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp of the signature.

functionDecorators.name: removeProviders
functionDecorators.description: Allows an associated address to remove providers from its Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: providers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of providers.

functionDecorators.name: removeProvidersFor
functionDecorators.description: Allows providers to remove providers to an Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to remove providers from.

parameterDecorators.name: providers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of providers.

functionDecorators.name: removeResolvers
functionDecorators.description: Allows an associated address to remove resolvers from its Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: resolvers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of resolvers.

functionDecorators.name: removeResolversFor
functionDecorators.description: Allows providers to remove resolvers from an Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to remove resolvers from.

parameterDecorators.name: resolvers
parameterDecorators.description: A list of resolvers.

functionDecorators.name: triggerDestruction
functionDecorators.description: Allows associated addresses recently removed via recovery to permanently disable their old Identity.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to trigger destruction of.

parameterDecorators.name: firstChunk
parameterDecorators.description: The array of addresses before the msg.sender in the pre-recovery associated addresses array.

parameterDecorators.name: lastChunk
parameterDecorators.description: The array of addresses after the msg.sender in the pre-recovery associated addresses array.

parameterDecorators.name: resetResolvers
parameterDecorators.description: true if the destroyer wants resolvers to be removed, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: triggerRecovery
functionDecorators.description: Allows recovery addresses to trigger the recovery process for an Identity. msg.sender must be current recovery address, or the old one if it was changed recently.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to trigger recovery for.

parameterDecorators.name: newAssociatedAddress
parameterDecorators.description: A recovery address to set for the passed EIN.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The v component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: The r component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: The s component of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp of the signature.

functionDecorators.name: triggerRecoveryAddressChange
functionDecorators.description: Allows an associated address to change the recovery address for its Identity. Recovery addresses can be changed at most once every recoveryTimeout seconds.

parameterDecorators.name: newRecoveryAddress
parameterDecorators.description: A recovery address to set for the sender's EIN.

functionDecorators.name: triggerRecoveryAddressChangeFor
functionDecorators.description: Allows providers to change the recovery address for an Identity. Recovery addresses can be changed at most once every recoveryTimeout seconds.

parameterDecorators.name: ein
parameterDecorators.description: The EIN to set the recovery address of.

parameterDecorators.name: newRecoveryAddress
parameterDecorators.description: A recovery address to set for the passed EIN.
